failed_screens.result: FAIL - Company in financial distress zone

screened_ideas.reason: Failed kill screens: M-Score -1.15 (manipulation risk) and Z-Score 1.01 (bankruptcy risk)

failed_screens.result: FAIL - Spread too narrow, historical return only 0.9%

passed_screens.result: PASS - Friendly deal, boards unanimously approved

screened_ideas.reason: Failed kill screens: M-Score 8.32 (manipulation risk) and merger spread 0.24% (too narrow, <2.5% threshold)

failed_screens.caveat: IMPORTANT: Altman Z-Score designed for manufacturing firms, not applicable to telecom/media. May be false positive.

screened_ideas.reason: Failed Z-Score kill screen (1.53 < 1.81). NOTE: Z-Score not designed for telecom/media companies - likely false positive given Piotroski F-Score of 9, strong ROE 24%, and healthy financials
screened_ideas.framework_note: Potential framework limitation: Altman Z-Score may need industry-specific thresholds or exclusions for non-manufacturing sectors

countervailing_evidence.financial_health: Strong cash flow, debt well covered

screened_ideas.reason: Deal already closed on December 9, 2025. No longer an arbitrage opportunity.

deal_details.status: CLOSED - AKRO is now wholly-owned subsidiary of Novo Nordisk
deal_details.delisted: Yes - no longer trading on Nasdaq
deal_details.cvr_terms: $6 per share upon EFX regulatory approval for MASH by June 30, 2031

screened_ideas.note: Stock trading at $54.65 reflects $54 deal price plus CVR value. Deal completed before analysis could be performed.

failed_screens.result: SEVERE FAIL - Extreme financial distress, well below critical threshold

screened_ideas.reason: Failed Z-Score kill screen (-5.39 << 1.81). Extreme financial distress with high bankruptcy probability. Z-Score below -1.0 indicates severe risk.

additional_red_flags.cash_burn_rate: Very high - burning through cash rapidly

pdufa_details.indication: Emergency treatment of severe allergic reactions/anaphylaxis
pdufa_details.adcom_status: Not required - FDA confirmed no Advisory Committee needed
pdufa_details.commercial_readiness: Preparing for Q1 2026 launch if approved

screened_ideas.framework_note: Despite promising product (first oral epinephrine) and imminent PDUFA decisions, severe financial distress disqualifies. Z-Score of -5.39 is catastrophic.

passed_screens.result: PASS - Strong financial health (improved from 1.74 distress in Oct 2025)

screened_ideas.reason: Failed M-Score kill screen (-1.1 > -1.78 threshold). However, this may be false positive given company just achieved first quarterly operating profit in Q3 2025.
screened_ideas.framework_note: Potential false positive: M-Score concern may reflect rapid transition from development-stage to profitable commercial company rather than manipulation

pdufa_details.pdufa_date_note: Extended from Nov 30, 2025 due to major amendment (post-marketing study protocol)
pdufa_details.clinical_data: Significantly higher growth velocity at Week 52 vs placebo, improved limb alignment
pdufa_details.publication: Pivotal ApproaCH Trial published in JAMA Pediatrics Nov 2025

screened_ideas.investment_thesis_if_screens_passed: Profitable rare disease company ($214M quarterly revenue) with two commercial products, strong balance sheet, and third product PDUFA in Feb 2026. Recent inflection to profitability. Large-cap biotech with sustained revenue growth.

screened_ideas.reason: Unable to obtain Beneish M-Score and Altman Z-Score from public sources. Cannot verify kill screens without these metrics.
screened_ideas.framework_limitation: M-Score and Z-Score not readily available for all small-cap biotech companies. May require manual calculation from SEC filings or premium data services.
screened_ideas.financial_assessment: Mixed: Strong liquidity and low leverage, but unprofitable with negative ROE. Not in severe distress but not financially strong either.

pdufa_details.pdufa_date_note: Extended from Dec 16, 2025 after FDA requested Clinical Study Report from field trial
pdufa_details.clinical_data_concern: Field trial did not meet primary endpoint, but company says supportive of activity
pdufa_details.regulatory_history: Two prior Complete Response Letters (CRLs) - Nov 2023 and April 2025
pdufa_details.fda_label_status: FDA shared draft label in early Dec; awaiting final labeling requests by Feb 16, 2026
pdufa_details.market_opportunity: Large dry eye disease market, but competitive

red_flags.regulatory_setbacks: Two prior CRLs - FDA stated April 2025 NDA 'failed to demonstrate efficacy'
red_flags.failed_field_trial: Most recent field trial missed primary endpoint
red_flags.third_attempt: This is 3rd NDA submission - persistence or futility?
red_flags.execution_risk: If approved, limited cash ($75M) for commercial launch vs. competitors

screened_ideas.recommendation: Manual review required. Calculate M-Score and Z-Score from 10-Q filings before proceeding. High regulatory risk given two CRLs and failed field trial.

screened_ideas.framework_fit_warning: ⚠️ PASSES KILL SCREENS BUT QUESTIONABLE FRAMEWORK FIT

framework_concerns.catalyst_materiality: Orphan drug approval immaterial to company this size
framework_concerns.expected_impact: 1-3% upside on approval, 0-1% downside on rejection
framework_concerns.idiosyncratic_fit: NO - Large-cap with diversified pipeline, not event-driven special situation
framework_concerns.better_suited_for: Long-term fundamental investors, not catalyst traders

pdufa_details.indication: Cholestatic pruritus in primary biliary cholangitis (PBC)

screened_ideas.assessment: First company to PASS both kill screens. However, mega-cap size makes single orphan drug approval immaterial. Doesn't fit idiosyncratic framework targeting underappreciated catalysts in smaller companies.

passed_screens.source: SEC XBRL FY2024 + Stooq price; computed

screened_ideas.notes: M-Score and Z-Score computed using SEC XBRL data (FY2023/FY2024) and Stooq price. LVGI uses total liabilities as a proxy for debt due to missing debt tags.

passed_screens.source: SEC XBRL FY2023/FY2024; computed with operating cost proxies

passed_screens.result: PASS - Grey zone, but above distress threshold
passed_screens.source: SEC XBRL FY2024 + Stooq price; computed

screened_ideas.notes: M-Score uses OperatingCostsAndExpenses as a proxy for COGS and SG&A due to airline reporting. Total liabilities derived as LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity minus StockholdersEquity.

passed_screens.source: SEC XBRL FY2023 + Stooq price; computed

screened_ideas.notes: FY2023 is the latest 10-K in SEC XBRL at time of pull.
